text: Billy Two Hats is a 1974 American British Israeli western movie directed by Ted Kotcheff and starring Gregory Peck, Jack Warden, Desi Aranz, Jr., David Huddleston, Vic Armstrong, Sian Barbara Allen. It was distributed by United Artists. ==Other websites== * * Category:1974 movies Category:1970s Western (genre) movies Category:American Western (genre) movies Category:British Western (genre) movies Category:Israeli movies Category:Movies directed by Ted Kotcheff
title: Billy Two Hats
